mutants.original_line: return reduce(lambda x, y: x | y, (reachable(it) for it in edges[n]), {n})
mutants.mutated_line: return reduce(lambda x, y: x & y, (reachable(it) for it in edges[n]), {n})

mutants.original_line: return reduce(lambda x, y: x | y, (reachable(it) for it in edges[n]), {n})
mutants.mutated_line: return reduce(lambda x, y: x ^ y, (reachable(it) for it in edges[n]), {n})
